attributes.action: Prevent Scottish, Welsh and Ulster MP's from holding cabinet positions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With Ulster, Scotland and Wales all now having regional assemblies, there is a clear conflict of interest in MP's from these regions holding cabinet positions in the UK parliament.
We would request the Prime Minister to introduce measures to prevent this from continuing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
